posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Hello hexoCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 终于正式完成了
posts.text: 一点也不懂代码啊，我弄了好长时间才正式弄好了，我的星期天就这么没了，不过，建成之后还是激动啊，超开心啊。群友们都好厉害233
